## Collections.KeyValueConverters.convertEntries() method

Converts a supplied iterable of unknowns to valid key-value pairs.

**Signature:**

```typescript
convertEntries(entries: Iterable<unknown>): Result<KeyValueEntry<TK, TV>[]>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

entries


</td><td>

Iterable&lt;unknown&gt;


</td><td>

The iterable of unknowns to be converted.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

[Result](./ts-utils.result.md)<!-- -->&lt;[KeyValueEntry](./ts-utils.collections.keyvalueentry.md)<!-- -->&lt;TK, TV&gt;\[\]&gt;

`Success` with an array of converted key-value pairs if all entries are valid, or `Failure` with an error message if any entry is invalid.
